    • Method Detail

      • OneGraphSpliterator

        public static Spliterator<Graph> OneGraphSpliterator​(Graph graph)
        Creates an array of Graphs from one graph. Handy for calling GraphSerializer.serialize(Spliterator,String[],Consumer,Consumer,Consumer) when you have only one graph.
        Parameters:
        graph - The graph.
        Returns:
        A graph with one element.

      • OneNamedStreamArray

        public static NamedStream[] OneNamedStreamArray​(File file)
                                         throws FileNotFoundException
        Creates an array of NamedStreams from one file. Handy for calling GraphDeserializer.load(NamedStream[],Schema) when you have only one graph.
        Parameters:
        file - The file.
        Returns:
        A graph with one element.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - If the given file does not exist.

      • OneNamedStreamArray

        public static NamedStream[] OneNamedStreamArray​(NamedStream stream)
        Creates an array of NamedStreams from one stream. Handy for calling GraphDeserializer.load(NamedStream[],Schema) when you have only one graph.
        Parameters:
        stream - The named stream.
        Returns:
        A graph with one element.

      • FindSingleStream

        public static NamedStream FindSingleStream​(NamedStream[] streams,
                                           String nameSuffix,
                                           String mimeType)
        Finds a single stream of the given type in the given list of streams.
        Parameters:
        streams - The streams to search.
        nameSuffix - The file extension to check the name for.
        mimeType - The MIME type to match.
        Returns:
        The first stream whose NamedStream.name ends with nameSuffix or whose NamedStream.mimeType is the same as mimeType, or null if no such stream was found.

      • FindStreams

        public static NamedStream[] FindStreams​(NamedStream[] streams,
                                        String nameSuffix,
                                        String mimeType)
        Finds all streams of the given type in the given list of streams.
        Parameters:
        streams - The streams to search.
        nameSuffix - The file extension to check the name for.
        mimeType - The MIME type to match.
        Returns:
        A possibly empty array of streams whose NamedStream.name ends with nameSuffix or whose NamedStream.mimeType is the same as mimeType.

      • FindLayerById

        public static Layer FindLayerById​(LinkedHashMap<String,​Layer> possibleLayers,
                                  List<String> possibleIds)
        Tries to find a layer in the given map, using an ordered list of possible IDs. Spaces, underscores, and case are ignored when looking for matching layer IDs.
        Parameters:
        possibleLayers - Collection of layers from which a possibility can be selected.
        possibleIds - Guesses at possible layer IDs.
        Returns:
        The first matching layer, or null if none matched.
